document_data.caption: Shou Lung emerald.
document_data.name: Shou Lung Emerald
document_data.mainbody: '''Shou Lung emeralds''', known as the bureaucrat's stone in [[Kara-Tur]], had a rich color and were highly valued in western [[Faer√ªn]]. A legend surrounding these stones held that there were only three of them in existence, but this was clearly a myth as there were at least a dozen known stockpiles of them in various locations around the West.
document_data.Description: Shou Lung emeralds were similar to western [[emerald]]s but were much harder and had a more lustrous polish. A typical specimen had a base value of 5,000 gp.
document_data.Powers: If this stone had powers, they have not been documented.
